title: Council Decision of 6 October 1997 replacing three members of the Scientific and Technical Committee
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 6 October 1997 replacing three members of the Scientific and Technical Committee (97/C 321/05)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular Article 134 thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 7 February 1994 on the renewal of the members of the Scientific and Technical Committee (1),
Having regard to the opinion of the Commission,
Whereas the seats of three members of the Committee have fallen vacant following the retirement of Mr Klaus SINGER, brought to the Council's attention by letter dated 22 September 1995, the death of Mr Jules HOROWITZ, brought to the Council's attention by letter dated 21 November 1995, and the resignation of Mr José LÓPEZ JIMÉNEZ, notified to the Council by letter dated 23 April 1996;
main_body: Mr Hans Bjerrum MØLLER, Mr Bertrand BARRE and Mr Rafael CARO are hereby appointed members of the Scientific and Technical Committee to replace Mr Klaus SINGER, Mr Jules HOROWITZ and Mr José LÓPEZ JIMÉNEZ respectively for the remainder of the latter's term of office which runs until 31 March 1998.
Each of these appointments shall take effect on the date on which the Council receives acceptance of that person's appointment.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 6 October 1997.
For the Council
The President
J. POOS
(1) OJ C 48, 13. 2. 1994, p. 5.
